description: This file defines an abstract repository interface for managing notes, and a concrete implementation that uses SharedPreferences for local storage. It handles loading and saving notes in JSON format, and references the Note model class.

classes.name: NotesRepository
classes.description: An abstract interface for notes data repository with methods to load and save notes.

classes.name: SharedPrefsNotesRepository
classes.description: A concrete implementation of NotesRepository using SharedPreferences for local persistence.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Loads all notes from local storage, returning an empty list if none exist or data is corrupted.

methods.name: saveNotes
methods.description: Serializes and saves a list of notes to local storage.
